name: Midnight Crop
description:
How to play :

-Mash the pumpkin to gain points!

-Gather the 3 resources (Fertilizer - Battery - Water) to gain score multipliers!

-Defend against the hord of daemons!

Controls :

- Move : WASD - Left Joystick

- MASH / Interact : Spacebar - Bottom Face Button

- Dash : Shift - Left Face Button

- Attack : Q - Right Upper Trigger

Creators :

- Benjamin Brunet - Programmer & Tech Art

- Antoine Flynn - Programmer & Tech Art

- Loic Bouchard - Environment Artist & Modeller

- William Pelletier - Character Artist

- Marie-Eve Duguay - 2D Artist / Concept Artist

- Jordan Massé - 3D Modelling

- Samuel Gagné - 3D Modelling

- Claudine Vandry - 3D modelling

Credits : 

Everything in this jam, from coding,3D,VFX,animations,etc... is made by us except for the enemies that came from this UE marketplace : https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/undead-pack-01
